title: S15 Ep10: A Walk In The Shadows
itunes:title: A Walk In The Shadows
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS takes A Walk In The Shadows with Mike Ricksecker! Mike has had a ton of experiences with the mysterious shadow people , and recounts his first experiences with them as a child and some creepy cases he has investigated! Mike also delves into where he believes where these shadow people come from and what their intent might be!

Get his book here: https://amazon.com

Visit Mike Here: https://www.mikericksecker.com/

Support our sponsors for great deals!
